name: I Had a Really Bad Dream
name_original: I Had a Really Bad Dream
description:
This is a Platformer made for Ludum Dare 43.
Hand drawn game made in 4 days.
It's midnight 12.00 PM
This is a platforming game made in 4 days.

This game  requires fast computer like gaming.

Sorry there's no sound made in 4 days.

If you what to get the video settings hold shift on your keyboard Graphics settings and input resolution.
